faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.discoverHow: Discover how Steero works in practice.

q1.question: Who is Steero for?
q1.answer:
Steero is for anyone who wants to take control of their finances, without becoming an expert or spending hours managing numbers.

Whether you're just starting out or have already tried spreadsheets, budgeting apps, or automated tools, Steero is for you if you're looking for clarity, understandable benchmarks, and a simple framework to move forward over time.

There are no financial prerequisites.

q2.question: What's the difference between Steero and a banking app or aggregator?
q2.answer:
Banking apps and aggregators mainly show what has already happened: balances, transactions, retrospective charts.

Steero takes a different approach. Steero is a steering tool, not just a viewing tool. It allows you to:
â€¢ set a direction (goals)
â€¢ follow a trajectory (budgets, indicators)
â€¢ spot gaps
â€¢ consciously adjust your decisions
â€¢ follow a clear rhythm that guides you

Where other tools inform, Steero helps you understand and act.

q3.question: Does Steero replace my banking app?
q3.answer:
No, and that's not its goal. Your banking app remains essential for paying, checking your accounts, and performing banking operations.

Steero complements it. It allows you to step back, structure your financial vision, and steer what your banking apps don't do: your rituals, your goals, your trajectory, your trade-offs.

In summary: the bank executes, Steero helps you decide.

q1.question: Why doesn't Steero connect to my banks?
q1.answer:
Automate â‰  Understand. 100% automated tools show numbers, but don't teach. Without cognitive effort, the user sees their finances without mastering them. Common result: illusion of control â†’ disengagement â†’ abandonment.

Understanding comes from conscious action. Manually recording a transaction forces you to identify the expense, categorize it, and link it to a budget or goal. This micro-effort activates learning and memory. It's the principle of learning by doing: you understand by doing.

Ritual creates lasting behavior. Steero favors a short, regular ritual. Conscious repetition transforms finance into a habit, not a constraint. A habit always beats a forgotten automated dashboard.

q2.question: How long does it take to record my transactions?
q2.answer:
Very little time â€” and much less than you might think.

In reality, most people make a few transactions per day, sometimes only a few per week. With Steero, recording them takes a few seconds. It's not about obsessively logging everything, but capturing the essentials regularly.

Why it's not burdensome:
â€¢ You don't have dozens of lines per day
â€¢ Recurring transactions quickly become natural to enter thanks to transaction templates
â€¢ The action fits into a simple ritual, not a chore

What you gain: you know where you stand without waiting until the end of the month, and you immediately spot where you are thanks to a dynamic budget indicator.

q3.question: Does Steero give financial advice?
q3.answer:
No. And it's intentional.

Steero doesn't provide personalized financial advice and doesn't replace a professional (financial advisor, tax specialist, lawyer).

The analyses, charts, projections, and indicators offered by Steero have an informational and educational purpose: they help you better understand your situation, visualize your trajectory, and step back from your decisions.

They are neither individualized recommendations nor guarantees of performance or results. Steero doesn't decide for you.

q1.question: Is my data secure?
q1.answer:
Yes. Security and respect for your data are priorities.

â€¢ Your data is stored securely
â€¢ Steero doesn't sell your information
â€¢ You remain the owner of your data at all times

Steero is designed as a trusted, sustainable, and respectful tool â€” not as a product based on exploiting your information.

We invite you to read the terms of service before trying.

q2.question: Where is my data stored?
q2.answer:
Your data is hosted on secure servers in Europe, in compliance with current regulations (GDPR).

We use modern encryption technologies and proven security practices to ensure the confidentiality and integrity of your information.

q1.question: Is Steero free?
q1.answer:
Yes, Steero is free for 14 days. This period allows you to discover the tool, use it in your daily life, and check if it naturally fits your way of managing your finances. No pressure â€” you can stop at any time during this period.

And after 14 days? A subscription is required to continue. This subscription helps maintain and improve the solution, ensure a stable experience, and develop new features.

An intentionally accessible price: the main subscription will cost less than â‚¬10 per month â€” the equivalent of a coffee per week, or a few minutes less of mental load each day.

q2.question: How does the waitlist work?
q2.answer:
The waitlist allows you to reserve your spot to access Steero as soon as it launches.

By signing up, you'll be among the first to know when the app opens. You'll receive an email to create your account and start your 14-day free trial.

Registration is free and non-binding.

q3.question: Can I use Steero on mobile?
q3.answer:
Not at the moment â€” and it's a deliberate choice. Steero is designed as a steering tool, not as an app to check between two notifications.

The financial ritual we advocate requires calm and concentration. Understanding a financial trajectory requires depth of information, comparisons, readable indicators, and a global vision.

Mobile is great for quick consultation. It's much less so for thinking, analyzing, and consciously adjusting. Steero is not designed to be "checked", but to be used with intention.

And for the future? Mobile is not excluded, but if it comes one day, it will be to serve steering, not to impoverish it.

q4.question: Will Steero evolve over time?
q4.answer:
Yes, and it's at the heart of the project.

Steero is designed as a long-term product, which evolves gradually to remain simple, relevant, and aligned with users' real needs.

New features will enrich the experience, always with the same philosophy:
â€¢ no unnecessary complexity
â€¢ no automation that dispossesses
â€¢ only what really helps to better steer

Subscriptions are precisely used to maintain this quality and make Steero evolve in the right direction.
